11:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> Hello anyone thr ?  
11:48 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> I am facing a problem..  
11:48 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> I'm using apache-httpd server 2.4.3 version and I'm trying to do the proxy configuration for xwiki. And I'm facing the following problem. [Sun Jul 28 14:20:39.706154 2013] [access\_compat:error] [pid 13040:tid 1099843904] [client X.X.X.X:36259] AH01797: client denied by server configuration: X:7280/xwiki/bin/view/Main/  Am I missing something ? A brief help will be appreciated.
